title: 95/47/EC: Commission Decision of 22 February 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/169/EC establishing an initial list of declining industrial areas concerned by Objective 2 as defined by Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 February 1995 amending Commission Decision 94/169/EC establishing an initial list of declining industrial areas concerned by Objective 2 as defined by Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 (95/47/EC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The two parts annexed to this Decision are added to the Annex to Decision 94/169/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 February 1995.
For the Commission
Monika WULF-MATHIES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 185, 15. 7. 1988, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 337, 24. 12. 1994, p. 11.
(3) OJ No L 81, 24. 3. 1994, p. 1.
